content.question: After the original dome of Hagia Sophia collapsed in 558 C.E., its architects responded by

choices.label: removing many of the buildingâ€™s original windows
using lighter materials in the reconstructed dome
decreasing the height of the dome and adding columns
increasing the height of the dome and adding buttresses

content.answer: increasing the height of the dome and adding buttresses

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
